001package imagingbook.calibration.data.zhang;
002
003import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
004
005import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
006
007import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.Camera;
008import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.ViewTransform;
009
010
011/**
012 * Supplies all numeric data for Zhang's demo calibration test suite.
013 * @author WB
014 *
015 */
016public abstract class ZhangData {
017        
018        public static final int ImageWidth = 640;
019        public static final int ImageHeight = 480;
020        public static final int NumberOfViews = ObservedPoints.pointData.length;
021        
022        public static Point2D[] getModelPoints() {
023                return StandardModel.getPoints();
024        }
025        
026        public static Point2D[] getObservedPoints(int viewNr) {
027                return ObservedPoints.getPoints(viewNr);
028        }
029        
030        public static Point2D[][] getAllObservedPoints() {
031                Point2D obsPoints[][] = new Point2D[NumberOfViews][];
032                for (int i = 0; i < NumberOfViews; i++) {
033                        int viewNr = i + 1;
034                        obsPoints[i] = getObservedPoints(viewNr);
035                }
036                return obsPoints;
037        }
038        
039        public static ViewTransform[] getAllViewTransforms() {
040                ViewTransform[] viewtransforms = new ViewTransform[NumberOfViews];
041                for (int i = 0; i < NumberOfViews; i++) {
042                        viewtransforms[i] = getViewTransform(i);
043                }
044//              return new ViewTransform[] 
045//                      {getViewTransform(1), getViewTransform(2), getViewTransform(3), getViewTransform(4), getViewTransform(5)};
046                return viewtransforms;
047        }
048        
049        public static ViewTransform getViewTransform(int viewNr) {
050                double[][] RT = CameraViews.getViewMatrix(viewNr);
051                return (RT == null) ? null : new ViewTransform(MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(RT));
052        }
053        
054        public static Camera getCameraIntrinsics() {
055                // http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/um/people/zhang/calib/Calibration/Calib.txt
056                return new Camera (
057                                832.5,   832.53, 0.204494,      // alpha, beta, gamma, (!)
058                                303.959, 206.585,                       // c_x, c_y
059                                -0.228601, 0.190353);           // k1, k2
060        }
061                
062        public static int extractViewNumber(String imgShortTitle) {
063//              String imgShortTitle = im.getShortTitle();
064                String num = imgShortTitle.substring(imgShortTitle.length() - 1, imgShortTitle.length());
065                return Integer.decode(num) - 1;
066        }
067
068}
